description: A Flutter widget that displays a horizontal list of filter chips for tags, allowing users to filter notes based on selected tags. It interacts with TagProvider and NoteProvider to fetch tags and manage active tag state.

classes.name: TagFilterBar
classes.description: A stateless widget that renders a horizontal list of filter chips for each tag, including an 'All' option, to filter notes based on selected tags.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget's UI, rendering a scrollable row of filter chips tied to the tag and note providers.
